message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get a unique product at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested!

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
